page.title: 01Our Location
page.content: Our area includes the villages of Barton(pop79)Aldersey(69) Clutton(100) and Coddington(83).We are A rural community in SW Cheshire near the Welsh Border. Chester is ten miles away in the NW. Wrexham is nine miles West. Whitchurch is ten miles South. The Sandstone Nature Trail runs on the East side of Clutton. The area is served by one school at Clutton which is on a hill 50 metres above sea level. From our playground we can see the Welsh Hills West of us with Eaton Hall five miles NW and Chester cathedral nine miles N. On the N horizon we can see the oil refineries of Ellesmere Port. Behind, and East of our school is Beeston Castle and Raw Head 227m above sea level.
